data.send1Text: Hi, noble Player! Good that you are here!
Hi, noble Player! Good that you are here!
data.send2Text: Yes-yes, my lantern is waiting for you!

data.send1Text: Don’t listen to him, dear %username%. You are here to fight darkness! In FAIR and EQUAL matches!
Don’t listen to him, dear %username%. You are here to fight darkness! In FAIR and EQUAL matches!
data.send2Text: Yes – equal! All are equal before me! Bronze and Challenger can die here very easily!
Yes – equal! All are equal before me! Bronze and Challenger can die here very easily!
data.send1Text: Here you can win money with responsible gamers of your rating!
Here you can win money with responsible gamers of your rating!
data.send2Text: They don’t leave, go AFK or feed so often as in regular LoL matches. I’m watching them!

textArray.text: Ok, sounds interesting. I want to try.

data.send1Text: Choose your destiny! Glory in tournaments or quick fun in Cash Games.
Choose your destiny! Glory in tournaments or quick fun in Cash Games.
data.send2Text: You can win real money in both of them! Like I can win souls everywhere!
You can win real money in both of them! Like I can win souls everywhere!
data.send1Text: So - where do you want to hunt?

textArray.text: I’m ready to play long and win big in a tournament!
I want to have quick result in a single match. Cash game, please

data.send1Text: Here all matches are for players of EQUAL skill. No team has an obvious advantage.
Here all matches are for players of EQUAL skill. No team has an obvious advantage.
data.send2Text: So matches are longer… More blood… More suffering!
So matches are longer… More blood… More suffering!
data.send1Text: Moreover, players risk their money and every match gives them a chance to win big prizes.
Moreover, players risk their money and every match gives them a chance to win big prizes.
data.send2Text: So you can imagine how they care about the match results! No feeding! No leaving! No more toxic players!
So you can imagine how they care about the match results! No feeding! No leaving! No more toxic players!
data.send1Text: Moreover, we hunt these dark creatures down and ban them!
Moreover, we hunt these dark creatures down and ban them!
data.send2Text: Report them immediately! So I can punish them! I’m the Chain Warden, after all!

data.send1Text: StarClient is like an arrow! It swiftly opens matches for you!
StarClient is like an arrow! It swiftly opens matches for you!
data.send2Text: StarClient is like my lantern! It watches toxic players and forgives nothing.
StarClient is like my lantern! It watches toxic players and forgives nothing.
data.send1Text: StarClient is like a good crossbow! It’ll send results of your matches right to our server!
